guidelines to open a Pull Request for Statismo repository. This text will not
be part of the Pull Request. -->


<!-- Read carefully the CONTRIBUTING (CONTRIBUTING.md) guide. Specifically:

 * Be sure the PR is related to an open issue,
 * Be sure to reference the issue in the PR,
 * Read the section related to commit message format.

When the PR is based on a single commit, the commit message is usually left as
the PR message.

If the PR is about a new feature, be sure that it is really needed (it should be discussed in an
opened issue before).

@mentions (https://help.github.com/articles/basic-writing-and-formatting-syntax/#mentioning-people-and-teams)
of the person or team responsible for reviewing proposed changes. -->
